ygData.subject: Re: Dual Weapon question
ygData.msgSnippet: How tough is the monster that drops the tomohawk? Salr D Taynkk Dark Warrior of The Kith Veeshan
ygData.messageBody:
How tough is the monster that drops the tomohawk?

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mikhali Mifsud [mailto:solomani@...]
> Sent: Saturday, May 15, 1999 3:11 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Dual Weapon question
>
>
> From: "Mikhali Mifsud" <solomani@...>
>
> I must really recomend the Polished Tomohawk to all my axe wielding
> brothers. This is an EXCELLENT weapon. Same stats as a mino axe but
> randomly casts a invulnerability type spell during battle (magic skin of
> about 200 hp abosorbition ability and +20 str). I would have two
> now if it
> wasnt for the fact I love my scimitars.
>
> Jaade
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jason Coan <COANJ@...>
> To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 11:28 AM
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Dual Weapon question
>
>
> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> >
> > If you are looking for non-magic, you should head to Crushbone
> and work on
> some Dwarven Axes, look the same as mino axes, damage 6 delay 28, less
> damage but MUCH faster, more hits = more over all damage.
> >
> > If you are looking for magic, you should head to Najena and work on some
> Tenticle Whips.
> >
> > Salr D'Taynkk
> > Dark Warrior of The Kith
> > Veeshan
> >
> > >>> CAB <Bash@...> 5.14.99 12:34:25 PM >>>
> > From: CAB <Bash@...>
> >
> > 16th level warrior full banded and a pair of Mino axes. Don't mind the
> > weight 133 str in current gear. Wondering what weapons I should be
> > looking to upgrade to. Keep hearing about combine weapons, but besides
> > being magical and 1 delay better than steel they don't seem that great.
> > What's the best 1HS weapon to get for dual for warriors?
> >
> > Bashlor
> >
